          <title>
            <string language="hu">Domenico Ghirlandaio: Nagyapa unokájával</string>
            <string language="en">Domenico Ghirlandaio: Grandfather and Grandson</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Domenico Ghirlandaio: Großvater und Enkel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Domenico Ghirlandaio : Grand-père et 
petit-fils</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Domenico Ghirlandaio: Avô e neto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domenico Ghirlandaio: Nonno e nipote</string>

          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Domenico Ghirlandaio: Nagyapa unokájával, 1490 k, Párizs, Louvre, 62 x 46 cm, tempera, fa.</string>
            <string language="en">Domenico Ghirlandaio: Grandfather and Grandson, about 1490 , Paris, Louvre, 62 x 46 cm, tempera, wood.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">quattrocento,  Ghirlandaio, Domenico,  Firenze,  Ghirlandaio,  portré,  reneszánsz,  </string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Domenico Ghirlandaio: Großvater und Enkel,
ungefähr 1490, Paris, Luftschlitz, 62 x 46 Zentimeter, tempera, Holz.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Domenico Ghirlandaio : Grand-père et 
petit-fils, environ 1490, Paris, auvent, 62 x 46 centimètres, 
tempera, bois.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Domenico Ghirlandaio: Avô e neto, 
aproximadamente 1490, Paris, grelha, 62 x 46 cm, tempera, madeira.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domenico Ghirlandaio: Nonno e nipote, circa

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Δομενηθο Ghirlandaio: Παππούς και εγγονός, 
περίπου 1490, Παρίσι, άνοιγμα εξαερισμού, 62 X 46 
εκατ., tempera, ξύλο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Domenico Ghirlandaio: Abuelo y nieto, cerca
de 1490, París, lumbrera, 62 x 46 centímetros, tempera, madera.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">quattrocento, Ghirlandaio, Domenico, Florenz, Ghirlandaio, 
Portrait, Renaissance,</string>
